object.movable

Interface IMovingEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMapObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bomb, Enemy, MovableEntity, Player

    public interface IMovingEntity
extends IMapObject
    Author:
    Loris
    Interface for all the Movable entities.
    provides methods to create motions of these entities between Cells of a TileMap

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAnimation(java.awt.Point newPosition, java.awt.Dimension tileSize)
      Creates the "animation" for the movement of this entity between the actual position and newPosition
      java.awt.Point getPosition()
      obtains the actual logical position of this Entity
      int getSpeed()
      obtains the speed of this entity
      int getSteps()
      obtains the number of steps this entity will do to move from a Cell to another
      void setActualStep(int x, int y)
      sets the actual step of this entity.
      void setPosition(java.awt.Point p)
      set the position of this Entity

      • Methods inherited from interface object.IMapObject

        draw, hasToDie, kill, update

      • createAnimation

                     java.awt.Dimension tileSize)
        Creates the "animation" for the movement of this entity between the actual position and newPosition
        Parameters:
        newPosition - where this entity must arrive
        tileSize - the size of a tile of the map
